title: Did Jerry Zuffman fire Hillary Clinton from Watergate's investigation?
subtitle: She graduated from Yale University Law School at the age of 26 and then became acquainted with her maiden name Hilary Rodham, who worked on the Watergate investigation.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Hillary Clinton was expelled from the investigation of the Judicial Committee of the House of Representatives by the Senior Advocate (Jerry Zefman)
